name: @kontent-ai-consulting/content-model-accelerator
description: This utility enables easy export / import of project structure's in Kontent.ai
author: Richard Sustek

scripts.release: npm run lint && standard-version && npm run update:version
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:es2022
scripts.test:list: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/node/cli/app --max-http-header-size=80000000 --action=list
scripts.test:export: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/node/cli/app --max-http-header-size=80000000 --config=export-config.json
scripts.test:import:file: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/node/cli/app --config=import-file-config.json
scripts.test:import:remote: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/node/cli/app --config=import-remote-config.json
scripts.test:help: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/node/cli/app --help
